RegionBossAffix.600901.2: Summons lightbulbs that orbit around it
RegionBossAffix.600902.2: Aims in the player's direction and launches a crawler
RegionBossAffix.600903.2: After a brief charge-up, fires a continuous laser in the target's direction
RegionBossAffix.600904.2: Extends mechanical arms and rapidly spins in place
RegionBossAffix.600905.2: Summons a lightning screen that spreads along the ground
RegionBossAffix.601001.2: Stretches its body to strike, dealing damage to a rectangular area in front of it
RegionBossAffix.601002.2: Stretches its body to attack, dealing damage in a cone-shaped area in front of it
RegionBossAffix.601003.2: After a brief charging up, launches consecutive leap attacks aimed at the target's current location
RegionBossAffix.601004.2: Curls inside a jar and rolls toward the target
RegionBossAffix.601005.2: Curls inside a jar and chases after the target
RegionBossAffix.601101.2: The Grotesque Dancer invites the enemy to dance with a fixed rhythm.
RegionBossAffix.601102.2: The Grotesque Dancer tunes up the volume and increases the intensity of the beat.
RegionBossAffix.601103.2: The Grotesque Dancer shifts position, taking control of the stage's rhythm.
RegionBossAffix.601104.2: The Grotesque Dancer weaves in motifs of continuation, enhancing synchronicity with fellow dancers.
RegionBossAffix.601105.2: The Grotesque Dancer uses a slide effect to create a dreamlike atmosphere.
